title: Afterlife Communication - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/20/22
itunes:title: Afterlife Communication - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/20/22
description:
George Noory and psychic medium Linnea Star discuss her lifelong ability to communicate with spirits that have passed over, and how dead loved ones try to send messages through dreams, deja vu, EVPs, orbs and even songs on the radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
